description: Registry of USGS monitoring stations used for Arkansas river and lake measurements. Not all stations are exposed in the UI.

stations.label: Little Red River near Heber Springs
stations.proximity: 0.5 mi downstream of Greers Ferry Dam

stations.label: Middle Fork Little Red at Shirley
stations.proximity: upper tributary, upstream of Greers Ferry

stations.label: Greers Ferry legacy station
stations.proximity: near Greers Ferry Lake

stations.label: Lake Maumelle at Dam
stations.proximity: at dam structure, west end of Lake Maumelle

stations.label: Lake Maumelle at Hwy 10
stations.proximity: mid-lake near Hwy 10 bridge

stations.label: Lake Maumelle at Natural Steps
stations.proximity: west side reservoir near Natural Steps

stations.label: White River at Newport
stations.proximity: at Newport, lower White River

stations.label: White River at Batesville
stations.proximity: at Batesville, upper-middle White River

stations.label: White River near Augusta
stations.proximity: near Augusta, between Newport and Clarendon

stations.label: Buffalo River at Ponca
stations.proximity: upper Buffalo near Ponca wilderness access

stations.label: Buffalo River near St. Joe
stations.proximity: mid-Buffalo near St. Joe / Boxley Valley

stations.label: Buffalo River near Harriet
stations.proximity: lower Buffalo near Harriet, above White River confluence

stations.label: White River at Bull Shoals Dam
stations.proximity: immediately below Bull Shoals Dam

stations.label: White River below Bull Shoals Dam
stations.proximity: 1-2 mi below Bull Shoals Dam

stations.label: Bull Shoals legacy station
stations.proximity: Bull Shoals Dam vicinity (legacy)

stations.label: War Eagle Creek near Hindsville
stations.proximity: upper tributary of Beaver Lake

stations.label: White River at Beaver Dam
stations.proximity: immediately below Beaver Dam tailwater

stations.label: White River near Busch
stations.proximity: downstream of Beaver Dam near Busch

stations.label: Ouachita River near Mount Ida
stations.proximity: upper Ouachita, upstream of Lake Ouachita

stations.label: Ouachita River at Carpenter Dam
stations.proximity: at Carpenter Dam, below Lake Ouachita

stations.label: Lake Ouachita legacy station
stations.proximity: Lake Ouachita vicinity (legacy)

stations.label: Caddo River near Caddo Gap
stations.proximity: upper Caddo, upstream of DeGray Lake

stations.label: Caddo River at Glenwood
stations.proximity: mid-Caddo near Glenwood, above DeGray Lake

stations.label: DeGray legacy station
stations.proximity: DeGray Lake vicinity (legacy)
